title: The Universe is Ours
description: A childhood of neglect and abuse are all she can remember as Katherine sets off on her journey with newly acquired freedom. After stumbling into a different dimension, she soon realizes her quest actually began long ago. Now it has taken her to Svylarohn, where everyone has been waiting for her arrival. She discovers the path she has followed is linked with five others, each hailing from a different civilization of Earth’s present-day history. They share one mission: save not only their former world but all of creation. History’s darkest villain, Xac Houzen, will not stop until history is rewritten in evil’s favor. But the chosen six quickly realize that isn’t all he desires. As she begins to unravel her past, the battle intensifies personally for Katherine, pushing her to discover her identity and morality in the process. Only then will good have their chance at victory, the fate of all resting in the hands of few and one chosen to make the ultimate sacrifice.
author: Brittany Porter
